title: Govt. decides to hold debate on IMF report
body_lines: The government has decided to allocate a date for a debate on the International Monetary Fund (IMF) report on Sri Lanka, Cheif Government Whip Minister Johnston Fernando said.
He said the report would be taken up for debate during the next Parliament week.
Former Prime Minister and UNP leader Ranil Wickremesinghe today requested for a Parliament debate on the IMF report while the Samagi Jana Balawegaya also called for such debate on the report.
